mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.radioId,t1.`name`,t1.positionId,t2.v position,t1.stationId,t3.ipaddr ip,t1.alais,t1.n_point,t1.e_point,t1.uid,t1.x_point,t1.y_point FROM t_radio t1 LEFT JOIN t_static t2 ON t2.id=t1.positionId LEFT JOIN t_substation t3 ON t3.id=t1.stationId WHERE t1.status!=3
mapper.update:
update t_radio
radioId=#{radioId},
name=#{name},
stationId=#{stationId},
positionId=#{positionId},
n_point=#{n_point}, e_point=#{e_point}, x_point=#{x_point}, y_point=#{y_point},
status=#{status}
id=#{id}
mapper.delete: update t_radio set status=3 where id=#{id}
